Name: sleeping sickness
Definition: A trypanosomiasis that results from infection by Trypanosoma brucei and gambiense

Name: Chagas disease
Definition: A trypanosomiasis that is a tropical parasitic disease caused by the flagellate protozoan Trypanosoma cruzi
Synonym: chagas' disease with other organ involvement

Name: obsolete adenovirus meningitis
Definition: An adenovirus infectious disease that results_in inflammation located_in meninges
